Jx.Plugin.Grid.Selector

Extends: Jx.Plugin

Grid plugin to select rows, columns, and/or cells.

Original selection code from Jx.Grid’s original class

License

Original Copyright © 2008, DM Solutions Group Inc.  This version Copyright © 2009, Jon Bomgardner.

This file is licensed under an MIT style license

Summary
Jx.Plugin.Grid.SelectorExtends: Jx.Plugin
Options
celldetermines if cells are selectable
rowdetermines if rows are selectable
columndetermines if columns are selectable
multipleAllow multiple selections
useCheckColumnWhether to use a check box column as the row header or as the first column in the grid and use it for manipulating selections.
checkAsHeaderDetermines if the check column is the header of the rows
sortableColumnDetermines if the check column is sortable
Functions
initconstruct a new instance of the plugin.
attachSets up the plugin and attaches the plugin to the grid events it will be monitoring
detach
activateAllows programatic access to turning selections on.
deactivateAllows programatic access to turning selections off.

Options

cell

determines if cells are selectable

row

determines if rows are selectable

column

determines if columns are selectable

multiple

Allow multiple selections

useCheckColumn

Whether to use a check box column as the row header or as the first column in the grid and use it for manipulating selections.

checkAsHeader

Determines if the check column is the header of the rows

sortableColumn

Determines if the check column is sortable

Functions

init

init: function()

construct a new instance of the plugin.  The plugin must be attached to a Jx.Grid instance to be useful though.

attach

attach: function (grid)

Sets up the plugin and attaches the plugin to the grid events it will be monitoring

Parameters

gridThe instance of Jx.Grid to attach to

detach

detach: function()

activate

activate: function (opt)

Allows programatic access to turning selections on.

Parameters

optthe option to turn on.  One of ‘cell’, ‘column’, or ‘row’

deactivate

deactivate: function (opt)

Allows programatic access to turning selections off.

Parameters

optthe option to turn off.  One of ‘cell’, ‘column’, or ‘row’
Extend: Jx.Object
init: function()
construct a new instance of the plugin.
attach: function (grid)
Sets up the plugin and attaches the plugin to the grid events it will be monitoring
detach: function()
activate: function (opt)
Allows programatic access to turning selections on.
deactivate: function (opt)
Allows programatic access to turning selections off.
